definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: He charged me to take good care of his children while he was away.
sentences.chinese: 他外出時託付我好生照顧他的孩子。

sentences.english: Good business is always about minimizing risks while maximizing your opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 好生意總是注重減少風險，同時你又在擴大着機會。

sentences.english: This is essential if you want to live a good life that’s your own.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要過自己夢想的美好生活，這是十分必要的。

sentences.english: The pursuit of good life reflects the superiority of human.
sentences.chinese: 對美好生活的追求體現了人之爲人的超越性。

sentences.english: As for himself, a good life could be stripped down to its simplest form.
sentences.chinese: 對他來說，美好生活可以精簡成最簡單的形式。

sentences.english: Angela and I share common values and compatible visions of the good life.
sentences.chinese: 安琪拉和我分享美好生活的價值觀和共處的願景。

sentences.english: The collapse of the pound has left many couples' plans for the good life in tatters.
sentences.chinese: 英鎊的崩潰已使許多夫婦對於美好生活的計劃破碎了。

sentences.english: Chapman joke is the "spy row" opened her "good life.
sentences.chinese: 查普曼笑談是“間諜風波”開啓了她的“美好生活”。

sentences.english: When an exam is too difficult , it " kills " the good as well as the bad.
sentences.chinese: 當試題是太困難的，好生水貨一同受害。

sentences.english: Buiding self-esteem is the first step towards your happiness_and_a better life.
sentences.chinese: 建立自尊是你通向美好生活的第一步。

sentences.english: It didn't take the new teacher long to separate . the sheep from the goat .
sentences.chinese: 新來的老師沒多久就把好生和差生區別開來了。

sentences.english: You can't make a good deal with a bad person.
sentences.chinese: 與一個品質敗壞的人無法完成一樁好生意。

sentences.english: MCPO staff would like to create nice life with you together.
sentences.chinese: 美高公司所有工作人員願與您共創美好生活。

sentences.english: Thus, we must create some conditions to help individuals seek and live a better life.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須注意創設條件，引導人追求且過上美好生活。

sentences.english: He was again honoured as the All-around Student. Both his teacher, and parents felt happy for him.
sentences.chinese: 評爲班級三好生了，老師和父母都爲他高興。

sentences.english: Runs out to their goals, the sower is a better life.
sentences.chinese: 向自己奮鬥目標飛奔的人，纔是美好生活的播種者。

definition: not as good as/not equal to/inferior
(dialect) form of address for one's wife/polite form of address for a woman
lord/master/young gentleman/male prostitute/catamite/mahjong player disqualified by unintentionally taking in the wrong number of dominoes/(old form of address for one's husband) husband
my husband and master (archaic)/playboy of rich family/pimp
